title: WTB T206 SGC 40 Commons in $30 range
author: stat192

posts.post_title: WTB T206 SGC 40 Commons in $30 range
posts.post_content: I have decided to begin to try and conquer the monster in 2015.   I have decided to try and obtain graded by SGC in 40 condition or better.   I would like to begin with obtaining as many commons as possible, looking to spend in the $30 per card range.   Willing to buy individually or as a large lot.   Let me know what you have.   Thanks,
